text.0: What is your organization doing to advance the transformation of health care? Visit our author center and let us know: https://t.co/B1r2ZQEjlu #HealthCareDelivery #HCLDR #HealthCareInnovation
text.1: The CDC's advisory committee voted 13-1 on Tuesday in favor of prioritizing both healthcare workers and residents of long-term-care facilities for vaccination against #SARSCoV2 during the initial phase of vaccination. #vaccine #COVID19
text.2: From the Insights on Residency Training blog: @VivekSantMD, who has seen residents collectively judge each new class of interns since his own intern year, muses about the culture shift he sees happening in residency training today. https://t.co/LCEryRBBPE https://t.co/5RAQ2u4PJT
text.3: Join Drs. Kimberly Manning, Lynn McKinley-Grant, Jenna Lester and @DrCandriceHeath in a free and open educational session. Register now! @SkinofColor @VisualDx #skinofcolor #dermtwitter
text.4: The NEJM Clinical Cases Resource Center aggregates educational content and interactive cases to help medical professionals advance their clinical diagnostic and therapeutic skills, and to provide engaging resources for teaching, continuous learning, and professional development.
text.5: Quick Take: Once-Weekly Treatment for Type 2 Diabetes https://t.co/RicgibfSoV
